name: Bellet Hull
description:
BELLET HULL

A short bullet hell shmup made in 7 days for the 2021 Bullet Hell Shmup game jam.

Every 10 seconds you toggle between normal continuous shot and charging a super shot. While you are charging you can only dodge.

Let go of all controls to force score pellets to move towards you.

Controls:

MOVE: wasd/arrows, hold left mouse button and move, touch screen and move, left analog or d-pad

FIRE: z/space, hold left mouse button, touch screen, A button

All rights reserved.
